tool_description: API that provides a random quote to inspire, motivate, or enlighten users. With this API, you can easily integrate a random quote feature into your applications, websites, or platforms, offering a diverse range of quotes from various authors, philosophers, celebrities, and more.
name: Random Quote Generator
title: Random Quote Generator

api_list.name: Generate Quote
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://random-quote-generator6.p.rapidapi.com/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-quote-generator6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://random-quote-generator6.p.rapidapi.com/generate"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "random-quote-generator6.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
